Package org.forgerock.openam.sm

Class ServerGroupConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.forgerock.openam.sm.ServerGroupConfiguration
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConnectionConfig
    public class ServerGroupConfiguration
extends Object
implements ConnectionConfig
    Represents the configuration information for a server group.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      String getBindDN()
      The Bind DN to use for the connection.
      char[] getBindPassword()
      The Bind password to use for the connection.
      int getLdapHeartbeat()
      The timeout in seconds to use for the heartbeat detection in the connection.
      Set<LDAPURL> getLDAPURLs()
      Creates a list of LDAPURL instances based on the server instances available in the servergroup.
      int getMaxConnections()
      The maximum number of connections that may be established to the server by the connection pool which corresponds to this configuration.
      boolean isAffinityEnabled()
      Tells whether affinity has been enabled for this connection.

      • getLDAPURLs

        public Set<LDAPURL> getLDAPURLs()
        Creates a list of LDAPURL instances based on the server instances available in the servergroup.
        Specified by:
        getLDAPURLs in interface ConnectionConfig
        Returns:
        A non null, but possibly empty list of LDAPURL instances based on the configured server instances in the corresponding server group.
